title: Sauna Can Treat WHAT?! | Dr Rhonda Patrick Reveals SHOCKING Benefits
description:
I recently spoke with Dr Rhonda Patrick, who is a cell biologist and cofounder of FoundMyFitness, a compendium of resources focused on promoting health-span and longevity. We discussed the benefits of saunas, cold exposure and exercise to live a longer healthier life. #sauna #ice #health
